step.text: Position the lamp forward - pull the handle, like this...
If the lamp is dim, push the button until the lamp is bright.
Position the Medium Focal Length Lens on the bench in Zone 1.
Position the Screen on the bench in Zone 3.
Slide the Medium Focal Length Lens back and forth. You'll see different parts of the light bulb and its reflector come into focus.

explanation.text: Remove the Screen and move the Lens to the middle of Zone 1 (a little closer to the Lamp). You can see a large image of the bulb and reflector cast onto a distant wall (or anything or anyone else in the light path).
